TopicTitle: Anyone got files for SM Marine?

Articles.Content: So basically i wanted to download SM Marine mod, but it seems all the links are gone. So i was wondering if anyone has got the files for SM Marine.

Yup.. they are gone... This is per the wishes of the mod author. Unfortunately, the mod has an All Rights Rerserved (ARR) license.
Therefore, it is technically illegal for anyone else to ever distribute it, or receive it by any means other than those specifically provided by, or approved by the author.

Unfortunately, its just best to consider the mod dead and gone, unless the author themself ever comes back to change the license.

Edited November 26, 2022 by Stone Blue
That is sad to hear but unfortunatelly it is what it is.
